version_description:
1.独木桥更水平了
2.解救了强迫症患者
3.悄悄在没有人的地方加了新的东西
4.这次更新没有修bug真是太优秀了

1. fix the problem of "rate us" button
2. optimize the visual effect
3.Level 1 now only unlocks 3 songs

1.Improved the fluency of operation caused by audio
2.Fixed audio issues of music loss, delay, and noise
3.Fixed the issues of new iCould data might be overwritten
4.Optimized the control preference page
5.Added CG album
6.Now players can refresh the challenge
7.Sound effect setting now only affects the hit effects
8.Added Voicers’ names in character pages
9.Fixed some mobiles will get stuck when entering Muse Dash
10.Extended the attack distance of characters

1. add activation code function
2. bunny girls join the rabbit ear
3. join Korean translation
4. remove the song Imaginary World
5. the preparation interface is added to the gold S and the full combo
6. join the reverse operation
7. the control preference page can be adjusted to the left

1. Recover Imaginary World and all data including achievements, score
2.Fixed the last version of the bug, which was difficult to unlock and changed the master mode

1.Two DLC packs added
2.「DISCO NIGHT」was added in the Original Chapter
3.Add「Siler S」rank（95.00-99.99%）
4.Fix for the difficulty of some of the scores
5.Fix for the game's partial mechanism

1.Fixed the display resolution error on iOS8
2.Difficulty can now be previewed at the DLC puchasing page
3.Complete the In-app purchase process
4.Fixed display error at some certain pages
5.Fixed music display error when changing the pages
6.Fixed the BROKEN programmers

1. A new song packs added.
2. Fixed the core-gameplay accuracy problems.
3. Fixed the display bug of the double track enemies in the castle scene.
4. Fixed the challenge unlimited refresh problem.
5. Fix some interface BUG.

1. 「Happy Otaku Pack Vol.2」 added!
2. 「糖果色恋爱学」 added into Original Pack.
3. Press the like mark to add songs into your Favourite Music.
4. Add buttons linked to the homepage of the artists into the TROVE page.
5. Two new loading illustrations added.
6. Improve the quaility of the songs！Although please forgive us for more occupation of the software.
7. Fix bugs in some of the interfaces.

1. 「Happy Otaku Pack Vol.3」 added!
2. Cross-platform ranking system added
3. A new Account system has been added which supports Wechat, QQ and overseas social media such as Facebook and Google
4. A new Japanese style scene was added! Guess where I am(^-^)

1.「 Budget is burning」 has been added FOR FREE!! Get it when you reach LV.30.
2.New loading illustration added.
3.The sound sourse of 「XING」 was updated.
4. The stage achievements of 「Thirty Million Persona」 HARD difficulty is revised to “Burst into Fever Mode for 4+ times”.
5. Fixed some stuck bugs and interface bugs.

1. The super popular music game 「Musynx」 and the music game 「MUSE DASH」 collaboration event boosts!Upgrade to level 20 to unlock the collaboration music!
2. "Just as planned" added, buy and unlock all the music packs permanently!
3. New music pack "Give Up TREATMENT Vol.2" added!
4. Notifications function added.
5. Display quality adjustment function added.
6. "Save" button added, save the illustration whenever your are reading them!
7. You could adjust the characters' hitting sound effect by "Sound Volume" now!(Finally)
8. Switch the red and blue color at the castle scene.

1.A Chrismates gift for you！Login before Dec.27 and get it for free!
2. New music pack "Give Up TREATMENT Vol.3” added!
3.Two new loading illustrations added.
4.Fixed the problem that players cannot run the game correctly.

1.A Chrismates gift for you！Login before Dec.27 and get it for free!
2. New music pack "Give Up TREATMENT Vol.3” added!
3.Two new loading illustrations added.
4.Fixed the problem that players cannot run the game correctly.
Fixed the Bug that players could not get "Christmas gifts"!
Fixed some UI bugs.
Fixed some UI bugs.

1. Hey guys，happy new year with 3 free songs added!
2. 「Happy Otaku Pack Vol.4」 out now!
3. Unlock limits of some songs have been quietly adjusted.

1. Fixed flash back problems on iPad of old model.
2. Fixed problem that players can not restore purchase, possibly.
3. Fixed「Sunshine and Rainbow after August Rain」stage achievements bugs.

1. Updated Give Up TREATMENT Vol.4
2. Added two new loading images.
3. Reduced the damage range of the gears.

1. New song 「Milk」added for free! Survive and you'll see what's going on!
2. Improve the tutorial. (Wait what!?)
3. Improve the accuracy of Gemini Enemies.
4. New illustration added!
5. The speed of ghost was adjusted into that of other regular enemies
6. The speed of Raiders was adjusted into that of the Hammers.

1. New song 「Milk」added for free! Survive and you'll see what's going on!
2. Improve the tutorial. (Wait what!?)
3. Improve the accuracy of Gemini Enemies.
4. New illustration added!
5. The speed of ghost was adjusted into that of other regular enemies
6. The speed of Raiders was adjusted into that of the Hammers.

1. A new [Happy Otaku Package Vol.5] is added.
2. Embedded home button on IOS full-screen face will not be falsely triggered.
3. The bug of [No Purchase] for songs on the [Favourite Music] surface is corrected.

Ding Ding Ding! Pero-chan has prepared new songs and heartwarming fixes for you!
1. [ Give Up TREATMENT Vol.5 ] is here!
2. The free song [ Evolution ] has arrived! Can be unlocked after reaching level 7!
3. Community requested [ BG BRIGHTNESS ] option has been added to the game! Please find the option at [ OPTION ] -> [ DISPLAY ] -> [ BG BRIGHTNESS ]!
4. Whiff recovery time greatly reduced!
5. Optimized visual effects.
6. Some bug fixes.

1. Introducing new free song "Night Wander (cnsouka Remix)"!
2. Fixed a problem that certain overseas users can not login to Account System.
3. New illustration for Children's Day!Happy Children's Day!

1. Here comes "Cute Is Everything Vol. 2"!
2. New free song "Aqua Stars - Sound Souler" arrives!
3. You can now "Manual FEVER"! Turn it on in "Options"-"Control" and give it a try!
4. New artwork for 1st Anniversary!
5. Loading screen will now show game tips!
6. Fixed a problem that certain graphic was not properly shown.
7. Adjusted unlock criterias of certain songs in "Default Music" pack.

1. New skin "The Girl In Black" hits the road!
2. Get happy for "Happy Otaku Package Vol.6"!
3. Fixed a few issues concerning gameplay mechanic.
4. Tweaked following charts:
- Lilith ambivalence lovers (MASTER)
- Soda Pop Canva5! (HARD)

1. Be cute! Be "Cute Is Everyting Vol.3"!
2. "Advanced Judge View" is hot! This feature shows whether you hit early or late on all notes. Turn this on in "OPTION" -> "DISPLAY" -> "JUDGE VIEW" (default OFF)!
3. Level designer will be revealed so you can boo who's chart bothers you most.
4. No more panic on pressing the Pause button accidentally! You now need to double-tap to bring up the Pause menu.
5. More minor brushing to core gameplay.
6. Fixed a few UI-wise bugs.
7. Adjusted certain stages' difficulty level (Stages remain the same, only the numbers change)
- Cheshire's Dance (Master) 11->10
- Star Driver (Master) 10->9
- Latitude (Master) 9->8
- GOODMEN (Master) 9->10
- Crimson Nightingle (Master) 9->10

- Try hard! Try "Give Up TREATMENT Vol. 6"!
- Hello from everywhere! New free song "Nihao" greets you at Level 16!
- All players with "Just as planned" purchased will now receive a 1.5x experience boost!
- New illustration, not one, but TWO!
- You can now slide to adjust offset in "Offset Adjustment"
- Fixed a bug that certain devices encountered game crash.

1.New [Happy Otaku Package Vol.7] music pack!
2.New Halloween start screen.
3. Added Halloween free song [umpopoff - まめこ], there is a rumor you may get some special chips after beating this song.
4.The weekly free song rotation is finally live! One song from the DLC music packs will be free for a week. The free song rotates every week and resets at 18:15 every Friday Beijing Time. The music pack which contains the weekly free song will also be on limited sale!
5.The start screen and loading screen customization system is also live! You can now choose an illustration or several on a random rotation for the loading screen and select your favorite start screen!
6.New illustration!
7. Hint: You may get the last chips for your wish (wat?) if you play some specific Halloween themed song on Halloween.

-Fixed an issue where players couldn't jump in certain songs with Robot233 equipped.
-Fixed an issue where the game would freeze after getting "The 89's Momentum" achievement and level up.
-Fixed the chips not dropping issue.
-Fixed the player losing chips issue.
-Fixed the programmer bro who updated the game with a lot of bugs.

1. Added New music pack [Cute Is Everything Vol.4]!
2. New Feature: When logging into your account, you can choose to use either local saves or cloud saves!
3. MDPD debuted! When the system detects cheats on the ranking, a Ban Notice will pop up!
4. Fix the issue which occurred in [Happy Otaku Pack Vol.7], the Sleepwalker Girl Rin will hit two notes simultaneously above a gear.

1. Added [Give up Treatment Vol. 7]!
2. Come and claim your Xmas Gifts!

1.The free music pack is coming!!! 「Budget Is Burning: Nano Core」 is here out of nowhere (?), and the three amazing collaboration songs will be available at level 15!
2.「Happy Otaku Package Vol.8」 Joined!
3.Added a very cute new illustration!
4.The times of skill activation for [Bad Girl Rin] and Elfin [Rabot-233] in a song has been increased from 3 to 5 now!
5.Fixed the bug that the girl in black would not get hurt even if she got hit by a barrier (gear)
6.Fixed the bug that the sheets (long notes) sometimes disappear when using the girl in black
7.Fixed the wrong beat sequence bug when the ultra-short sheets (long note) are lining up with the single-beat enemies
8.Fixed some known bugs
Finally, We wish you all a Happy Spring Festival!
1. Fixed the gears damage bug at the castle scene

1. Music pack 「Give Up Treatment Vol.8」added!
2. Finally! We fixed the priority issue when single beat notes and short hold notes appear next to each other in "Dr.Techro".
3. Fixed the bug where players will lose their save data when they quit the game without selecting a save after logging in.
Fixed the in-app purchase crash issue.

1. [Cute Is Everyting Vol.5] is here!
2. Added Easy and Master difficulties for [Milk]
3. There is going to be a hammer festival on a hard level song on April Fools’! I saw this on the internet so it gotta be true!
4. Added a photo with a angry Buro on it.
5. Made a few adjustments to the sheets of [Milk] and [GOODTEK（Hyper Edit）]
6. □□□□

1. Halooo! New free music pack [新世界より] added! We are collaborating with 綾奈なな!  ヽ(*´∀｀)ﾉ

2. Added [綾奈なな] collaborate start screen! Get it by simply logging in between April 30th and May 7th! The start screen will be added to random drops for leveling up later!

3. [Happy Otaku pack Vol.9] is out now!

4. Hidden music added! Smash the [Irreplaceable] difficulty select button and let us feel your passion!!

5. Adjusted the English title and artist name for「蓋棺クリサリス」. Old versions will not be able to upload scores, so if you're going for the leaderboard remember to update your game!
6. Now you can save your score of the hidden sheet on your device.

7. Fixed the keep getting duplicate chip bug. (Well, maybe)

Happy birthday to ME!!(○´∀`)ﾉ(*´∀`*)
1.New character [Sailor suit Buro] and the new music pack [MUSE RADIO] is now out in the lastest update! Purchase [MUSE RADIO] will unlock [Sailor suit Buro] and a unique illustration.
2.We are collaborating with Fubuki Shirakami! New collaboration song [Say!ファンファーレ! ] and a illustration with the lovely fox.
3.Stage change feature is here! Come and try out [もぺもぺ] ! Plz~~
4.New stage added! Return to the retro theme stage!
5.New free song [Best One feat. tooko] and 2nd Anniversary illustration.
6.Fixed the cloud save error bug again. (maybe

1. Added the button mash hidden sheet for [INFiNiTE ENERZY -Overdoze-]

2. Added a hidden illustration that will only show up by itself.

3. Happy Father's Day!

4. Fixed the issue where [Rabot-233]'s skill is used during the stage change in [もぺもぺ]

5. Fixed the issue where [Sailor suit Buro] couldn't achieve the golden S rank

1. After the prevail of Puna! Puna! War, a wild final boss wearing a Sailor suit has appeared?! [Give Up Treatment Vol. 9] is OUT NOW!

2. Added stage change feature to [This Club is Not 4 U].

3. Fixed the Sailor Suit Buro not attacking marked enemies issue in [MilK].

4. Fixed the long notes disappear issue.

1. Collaboration Music Pack [Nanahira Festival ] debuts!
2. You can get the new collaboration start screen for free from July 31 to August 7 just by opening the game! After the period, it will be unlocked if you own "Just As Planned" or [Nanahira Festival].
3. Added a "Extra life!" illustration.
4. Changed the sound source for [Dr.Techro]. Terribly sorry for changing the sound source, I will definitely do it again! ( ‵▽′)ψ
5. Changed stages for several songs.
6. Changed the master difficulty display level from 8 to 9. Showing its true face, huh. (?)
7. Fixed the sheet issue for [プナイプナイげんそう～プナイプナイinワンダーランド～].

We are collaborating with Groove Coaster! And finally! A fourth character is entering the roster!

Check out the details below:

1. New music pack [Let's GROOVE!] is here! Owning [Let's GROOVE!] will also unlock the new collaboration character [Navigator Yume] and a special illustration!

2. Collaboration character [Navigator Yume] joins the fight! Now, let the gears feel the fear of being crushed! *( ￣皿￣)/#
3. Hidden sheets also exist in the new [Let's GROOVE] music pack.
[FUJIN Rumble], [HG魔改造ポリビニル少年], and [ouroboros -twin stroke of the end-]. Mash the difficulty button to unlock the hidden sheet for [FUJIN Rumble] and [HG魔改造ポリビニル少年]. Use the following combination to unlock the hidden sheet for [ouroboros -twin stroke of the end-]: Starting at Master, Hard -> Easy -> Hard -> Master -> Hard-> Easy-> Hard-> Master
(The number of songs might change, pls refer to the actual update. :P)

4. New stage, Let's GROOVE!

Finally!

We have fixed the iOS 14 crash issue after fixing the programmer who was not able to fix the issue.

Terribly sorry for keeping you waiting... m(＿ ＿)m

No update, no new content. Good day! Rhythm players!
1. [Cute Is Everything Vol.6] is out now!
2. You will get the collaboration illustration by finishing any Marpil songs! Our album wall is now another landmark!
3. Login during Oct 31st ~ Nov 7th to unlock a Halloween lew... cough cough illustration! It will also enter the level-up drop pool later.
Wish Y'all a Happy Halloween in advance!

Dude, I can't believe I'm updating with the best cyberpunk game of November!
 
New "Happy Otaku Package Vol.11" added.
 
Boss can fire more kinds of bullets now! Young man, you don't talk about Wude!
 
A brand new illustration has been added! Favorites Big Satisfaction (￣▽￣)"

Apple-jan will be away during Christmas, that's a good enough motivation for us to push the update earlier! Reverse delay!

1. The opening song [水夏える feat. 月乃 - ドーナドーナのうた]
from Dohna Dohna is released in the Base game for free!Collaboration music pack [Let's do bad things together!] out now!
Unlock the BURO x PORNO cosplay title screen by purchasing the collaboration pack!This time, I wanna be the bandage (( (//A //) ))

2. Christmas celebration song [かめりあ feat. ななひら - クリスマスなんて興味ないけど] is also updated to the base game! Free new songs *2!

3. Added secret sheet for [ミツキ - Square Lake],
enter the upside-down by mashing the difficulty button!

4. Optimized the gameplay experience of [Final Step!].

Update the game now and let's do some bad things together! OwO

22 new tracks, 1 new collab character, 2 new welcome screens, 4 collabs, 6 new illustrations, 6 new hidden sheets!
The most *bleeped* Muse Dash update since launch!

1. CytusII x Muse Dash collab: purchase the new [cyTus] music pack to unlock 12 collab tracks, a new welcome screen, and the invincible collab character [NEKO#ΦωΦ].

2. HARDCORE TANO*C x Muse Dash collab confirmed: collab music pack [HARDCORE TANO*C] added!

3.犬山たまき x Muse Dash collab: Original song [REDALiCE feat. 犬山たまき - 恋のMoonlight] added to the game for free!

4. Christmas Tina x Muse Dash collab confirmed: Theme songs from Christmas Tina -- [bermei.inazawa - Mezame Eurythmics] & [bermei.inazawa - Shenri Kuaira -repeat-] added to the game for free! Unlock the collab illustration by playing any of the tracks!

5. New track [3R2 - Magical Wonderland (More colorful mix) ] added to the game for free!

6. New 寺田てら X Muse Dash welcome screen! Play Muse Dash during 2/5～2/18 to receive it! (Will be randomly unlocked as you level up )

7. Unlock 5 new illustrations for free as you level up.

8. Added 6 new hidden sheets. Click through the difficulty levels and you might just be surprised!

9. Brand new filtering system to better sort, randomize, and hide the tracks!

2 packs and 4 collabs to dash through the festival
4 tracks and 6 illustrations to make sure it’s memorable!
Now applaud me, hahaha! XD

Fixed the issue where the title screen will only show [SONG TITTLE SONG TITTLE] and can't start the game.

Fixed the bug in the weekly free song feature which is causing the error in the new filter system. (The weekly free song will resume after the iOS version is also updated)

* You will need to update your game to recieve the weekly free song notification!

Now applaud me, hahaha! XD

A letter to [Muse Dash] fans
To our lovely friends:
Thanks y’all for supporting [Muse Dash] and helping us grow over the years! Due to the extremely modest price point of [Just as Planned], our company has undergone colossal financial losses, making it impossible for us to feed our devs and continue to update [Just as Planned]. We are preparing to file for bankruptcy in the following days.
For anyone who hasn’t gotten their hands on Muse Dash, we liquidated all our assets to bring to you one last discount event: starting from Mar 25th through April 7th, the base game will be 70% off, and Just As Planned 20% off. You won’t be hearing from us anymore after this.
Our final update includes:
1. [Happy Otaku SP]: purchase the music pack to unlock the new character [Part-time Warrior Rin] and a new loading screen. With her staggering physics-defying power, Rin is the ultimate personification of the collective creativity of PeroPeroGames.
But we had been too broke to be able to create this character to meet our previous standard. For that we’re sorry, but we really gave it all we got!
2. A new welcome screen by the most superb art team at PeroPeroGames, depicting Lead Singer Marija, Fire Extinguisher Rin, Accompanist Buro, and Band R.M.B. Log in to the game between March 30st and April 7th to unlock the welcome screen, after which it will be added to the list of random level-up rewards.
3. Two new hidden sheets: [Cosmograph - DataErr0r], and [P*Light - TWINKLE MAGIC]. It shouldn’t come to you as a surprise that these are unlocked by frantically clicking through the difficulty options.
4. Fixed a bug that caused the title screen dialogues to malfunction.
It’s with a heavy heart as we end [Muse Dash] on such a note, Thanks for your understanding and support!
[Muse Dash] dev team: PeroPeroGames
April 1st, 2021

04/01:

Thanks y’all for the overwhelming influx of hate! Our dev engines are now so rich in hate that they are functioning at full capacity. Looks like we were able to survive this cash-tastrophe after all and come out even stronger! No rush disposing of your undealt hate, as it motivates us in a weird but effective way.

==========

Thank you so much for supporting Muse Dash! (ﾉД`)

Due to the extremely modest price point of [Just as Planned], our company has undergone colossal financial losses, and this quite possibly could be the last update you will ever see.

1. [Happy Otaku SP]: purchase the music pack to unlock the new character [Part-time Warrior Rin] and a new loading screen. With her staggering physics-defying power, Rin is the ultimate personification of the collective creativity of PeroPeroGames.
But we had been too broke to be able to create this character to meet our previous standard. For that we’re sorry, but we really gave it all we got!

2. A new welcome screen by the most superb art team at PeroPeroGames, depicting Lead Singer Marija, Fire Extinguisher Rin, Accompanist Buro, and Band R.M.B. Log in to the game between March 30st and April 7th to unlock the welcome screen, after which it will be added to the list of random level-up rewards.

3. Two new hidden sheets: [Cosmograph - DataErr0r], and [P*Light - TWINKLE MAGIC]. It shouldn’t come to you as a surprise that these are unlocked by frantically clicking through the difficulty options.

4. Fixed a bug that caused the title screen dialogues to malfunction.

It’s with a heavy heart as we end [Muse Dash] on such a note, Thanks for your understanding and support!
[Muse Dash] dev team: PeroPeroGames
April 1st, 2021

1. New music pack [Give up Treatment Vol.10] added; BOF contestants joining the roster.

2. Added 3 new FREE illustrations, celebrating Muse Dash reaching 5 million copies sold!
Hey you, you are finally awake. Time to grind for chips.

3. Oh, and we grew a bamboo forest

Phigros X Muse Dash! Not the collab we were expecting but definitely something to hold us over!

1. Collab music pack [Phigros] is alive and kicking and comes with an exclusive illustration!

2. [Cute is Justice Vol.7] is finally here~

3. Play Muse Dash from May 28th through June 24th to unlock 2 new illustrations for free!

4. [Se-U-Ra - Igallta] joins the hidden sheet club!
Brace your fingers for the new challenge! Keep clicking through the difficulty options until you enter the hidden world! (｀▽′)ψ

News express for the 3rd Anniversary update----

1. Retro music pack [Muse Radio FM102] has now been added! Purchase it now to unlock the 3rd Anniversary welcome screen! Welcome back to the Burowave music channel!!

2. Two new illustrations, level up to collect the chips! (>∀･)

3. [砂糖协会 - 去剪海的日子] hidden rhythm added!! Press and hold down on the track cover to get the vaporwave hidden track~ This is sugar radio!

4. [HiTECH NINJA - Medusa] has joined the hidden sheet family -- LOOK AT ME

5. [Sailor Suit Buro] receives a new look!

6. The original [Muse Radio] music pack is now [Muse Radio FM101] !!
Happy Birthday to me~\( ﾟ∀ﾟ)/

News express for the 3rd Anniversary update----

1. Retro music pack [Muse Radio FM102] has now been added! Purchase it now to unlock the 3rd Anniversary welcome screen! Welcome back to the Burowave music channel!!

2. Two new illustrations, level up to collect the chips! (>∀･)

3. [砂糖协会 - 去剪海的日子] hidden rhythm added!! Press and hold down on the track cover to get the vaporwave hidden track~ This is sugar radio!

Terribly sorry for the new bugs that were introduced in the previous update, all of them have now been fixed ！

1. Fixed the issue with “Bunny Girl Rin” whose scores weren’t properly recorded . Changes will be reflected across the leaderboards as well.

2. Fixed the issue with the hidden sheet for [HiTECH NINJA - Medusa] which prevented players from returning to the normal version.

3. Fixed the issue that prevented the new illustration from being unlocked.

4. Fixed the issue where the controls occasionally became unresponsive on iOS.

Please note that our next update will be mandatory due to the negative effect on the leaderboard caused by the aforementioned bugs in the previous update.
Until the next update, players will still be able to upload their scores to the leaderboard. Please download the update as soon as it is released for real-time access to online features. We will work on updating the leaderboards until all scores are accurately recorded through July 30th.
Again, we are terribly sorry for the inconvenience this may have caused.

Muse Dash July update, incoming!
1. [Happy Otaku Pack Vol.12] added! Grab the otaku sword of [Rush-More], and adventure into the mysterious world (aka the game)!

2. You can now opt to switch between the different art styles of [Sailor Suit Buro]! Who says you can’t have BOTH?

3. You can now swap fingers/buttons mid long notes again! Play the tracks with style~

4. Fine tuned the Master difficulty sheets for [Plumage], [Final Step!], and [Hydrangea]; made slight changes to the hidden sheet for [Ginevra]. The score caps are increased.
Made minor adjustments to the hidden sheets for [Φ], [You Make My Life 1UP] and [HG魔改造ポリビニル少年]. No changes to the score caps.

5. Adjusted the difficulty indicator for several tracks. Show me your true form!

6. Adjusted the visual effects in [MARENOL].

Ready Get Set Go！
1. Rhythm Doctor X Muse Dash X A Dance of Fire and Ice triple collab music pack [7th Beat Games] added!! Unlock the new elfin [Doctor Paige] and a collab illustration by purchasing the new music pack!
2. The first collab elfin has appeared! Get a special buff every 7 hits, S rank is no longer a dream~
3. 1234567, new visual effects, check!
4. Tag filter added!
5. New [Brain Power] cover art.
HOT TIP: [Super Battleworn Insomniac] is defaulted to the hidden sheet version, you will return to the normal version by playing through it once.
Press and hold the cover art to switch back to the hidden sheet version!
Phase 1: update the game! Phase 2: ??? Phase 3: PROFIT! (As in getting the new elfin XD)

Resolve incidents in Gensokyo!

1. Touhou Project x Muse Dash collab update is OUT NOW!

New collab character [Red-white Miko -- Hakurei Reimu] and music pack [Touhou Mugakudan] added！

2. Purchase the [Touhou Mugakudan] music pack to unlock [Hakurei Reimu] and a special welcome screen! Even in the world of Muse Dash, the Hakurei Shrine Miko has managed to maximize her signature mid-air combat skills.

The [Just as Planned] exclusive music pack - [Just as Planned] PLUS - is receiving four new tracks: [3R2 - The Happycore Idol] , [削除 - Amatsumikaboshi], [MYUKKE. - ARIGA THESIS], and [ビートまりお - ナイト・オブ・ナイツ]

We’ll continue to add more exciting content to [Just as Planned] PLUS! ‘Tis an investment you won’t want to miss out on!!

3. Two new hidden sheets! Click through the difficulty options *frantically* to unlock the new hidden sheet in [削除 - Amatsumikaboshi], [Alstroemeria Records - Bad Apple!! feat. Nomico]!

4. Log in by October 6 to claim a collab special illustration for free! After October 6, it will drop at random as a level up bonus.

5. Adjusted the visual effects for the hidden sheet versions of [fizzd - Super Battleworn Insomniac] and [Yooh - Heracles].
Adjusted the master difficulty level for [Sugar & Co. - happy hour] and increased score cap.


[Touhou Mugakudan] + [Just as Planned] PLUS = 10 tracks + 2 loading screen + 1 welcome screen = Happiness PLUS!!!

Double click [The most important secret treasure of Hakurei Shrine] (Reimu's Yin-Yang Orb) to get back to resolving incidents in the Gensokyo!

Happy Halloween!
1.Added the Halloween special music pack [Happy Otaku Vol.13]! Spooky DJ’s are on the radio!
2.Login during 10/29~11/04 to unlock the Halloween loading screen illustration! You won’t like it when Buro is all out of candy!
3.Shhh~~ Don’t tell anyone, we snuck a new track into [Just As Planned PLUS]...
4.Fixed the bug which led to incorrect chip awards.
5.Optimized the track filter with a scroll bar so that you can now locate a track much easier~
